For the Maths lovers! Solve different kind of problems. 
 
Arithmos will be conducted in two rounds prelims and mains. 
 
Rules and Regulations : 
 
Prelims ~ 
 
 All the questions in the prelims will be of objective type. 
 
 There will be 25 questions in the prelims. 
 
 Every question will have only one correct alternative. 
 
 Each question carries 3 marks. 
 
 For every incorrect answer 1 mark will be deducted. 
 
 Zero will be given for no response. 
 
 Choosing more than one option will be treated as incorrect response. 
 
Mains ~ 
 
Questions in the mains will be of subjective type.
